title: Who Are Your Top 5 Most Satisfying Champs to Play?
body:
Title.

Mine are:

1. {{champion:75}} Stacking all game long and then flanking the enemy team at your nexus turrets for a 1v5 quadra kill before steamrolling their base.
2. {{champion:238}} Walking away to hear "SPLAT" *You have slain an enemy*.
3. {{champion:86}} Executing Villains. 'Nuff said.
4. {{champion:53}} A perfect hook combo just makes that match a little bit more perfect.
5. {{champion:13}} Landing his chain combo perfectly feels amazing.

replies.body:
1. {{champion:34}} Bird is bae
2. {{champion:268}} Also a bird. Also SHURIMA
3. {{champion:161}} Because learning laser and Q are so much fun
4. {{champion:121}} Change is good
5. {{champion:34}} a second time bc <3

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Rainslight,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ot81HJ8b,comment-id=0024,timestamp=2016-01-02T22:11:05.584+0000)
>
> 1. {{champion:34}} Bird is bae
> 2. {{champion:268}} Also a bird. Also SHURIMA
> 3. {{champion:161}} Because learning laser and Q are so much fun
> 4. {{champion:121}} Change is good
> 5. {{champion:34}} a second time bc <3

I like you.
I like me too.

Myself*

Grammar {{champion:51}} is on the case
it was a typo actually.  it was supposed to say "i like mewtwo"

You say you like birds, yet...
I find your lack of {{champion:133}} disturbing
And what about Talon?
Yeah. Anivia has ten of them.
This is one of the best replies I have ever seen
Thanks! I'll be here all week :3

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/3/3b/Anivia_OriginalSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150610012621

I only see 8 though :(
She's only 1/2 birb. Like Swain.

She might be 1/2 bird, but she's 10/10 <3

I tried.

But on a more serious note, what do you think about Quinn (if you've played her)?

1.  {{champion:105}} can dodge everything with e
2.  {{champion:105}} can dodge everything with e
3.  {{champion:105}} can dodge everything with e
4.  {{champion:105}} can dodge everything with e
5.  {{champion:105}} can dodge everything with e
Can't dodge dots.
{{champion:9}} Oh hello.
{{champion:61}} There's really no comparison to a 5-man shockwave.

Yes there is. 
5 man shockwave into 5 man yasuo ulty.

Mid: {{champion:91}} 1 shot everyone every 10 seconds
Top: {{champion:17}} cant touch this satan troll hamster bastard - Counter to all top laners  :P
Jungle: {{champion:107}}  1 shot everyone every .... well.. whenever u get ult :P
Support: {{champion:16}}  oh, so u want to kill my adc? let me heal him up full hp so u cant trade at all :P
Adc: {{champion:29}}  A F*ucking ... RAT, who goes around and pretends he's an assassin
Are you satan? If twicht changed to kalista or vayne i would just qq if i had to play against that team.

{{champion:75}} I love it when I am 1/4 but super well farmed and everyone is bitching at the enemy laner for feeding me
{{champion:79}} Nothing beats the feeling of a well timed ult to get the enemy squishies under your tower
{{champion:54}} Choo-choo here comes the pain train (Bonus points if duoQ with a yas main)
{{champion:45}} BOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM!!
{{champion:80}} It's a bird, it' a plane, IT'S THE BAKER!!

{{champion:14}} : 6k hp too good

{{champion:102}} : Insane Jungle Clears

{{champion:78}} : Fun personality, and her ult is hilarious

{{champion:35}} : Complain all you want, i enjoy the damage.

{{champion:75}} : Because your Q doing 800+ damage is hilarious.

With Poppy, its even funnier when the body flies up in the air when you kill with the ult, I laugh my ass off everytime (along with the many different interactions that can happen with it, Tahm can eat poppy as she ults so he gets launched with her inside him, I was laughing for 5 minutes straight)

{{champion:83}} : I once 2v1 their team for a penta kill because they came in wave
{{champion:3}} : 5 man ult only for them to have a Braum still satisfying 
{{champion:12}}/ {{champion:54}}/{{champion:154}}  : I might of just became a baby daddy of 5
{{champion:98}} :I'm a silent guardian, watchful protector, a ~~Dark Knight ~~ Flipping Ninja
{{champion:44}}: There always that one game where they can't kill you, stun, smack, shatter, smack, heal, smack, stun, smack.

1. {{champion:134}} Landing that teamwide stun for the win really is the best feeling

2. {{champion:61}} See number 1 but with Shockwave

3. {{champion:43}} Ult + W when an assassin dives me under tower is my fav. And saving an ally near death with an ult + E is also hilarious

4. {{champion:10}} in the jungle. saving an ally with a clutch heal, dat ult, soloing entire teams with hurricane and a shit ton of AP and AS.

5. {{champion:267}} Three man bubble into tidal wave. mmmmm so exquisite.

Honorable mention to {{champion:90}} for chain kills with E after I die.
Utility... utility everywhere!

{{champion:75}} for the same reason as you.
{{champion:69}} for when you manage to poison your enemy with Q... and then E>E>E>E>E>E>E!!!!
{{champion:82}} for when you get a ghost dragon...SIEGE TIME!
{{champion:133}} for when you can just fly in and NAIL an unsuspecting squishy!
{{champion:12}} for when you knock up an ADC, then headbutt them into your turret...an enemy has been SLAIN!

{{champion:74}} : DONT - DONT - DONT - DONT
{{champion:127}} SURR - SURR - SURR - SURR
{{champion:75}} THE - THE - THE - THE
{{champion:86}} HEY - HEY -HEY
{{champion:238}} I JUST LOVE ANY CHAMP WHO CAN SPAM EMOTES

1. {{champion:131}} is my favorite champ love making her work. i had a really hard time starting out with her since its a melee vs ranged champs, its was so satisfying when she finally clicked with me.
2. {{champion:134}} my 2nd go to champ mid and it feels really good to outplay/make her kit work.
3. {{champion:267}} my #1 sup when you can land her E and set up fights for your team its the best feeling i ever get a a sup.
4. {{champion:28}} her kit is not complicated on its own but it takes allot of strategy to do well with her. catching people out is tons of fun.
5. {{champion:17}} is ALLOT of psychological play. way to many people hate him because everyone else does and people think he is only a troll. utilizing his kit, particularly the vision from his ult and thinking about how the enemy feels when you do something rather than just what their champ does is very satisfying.

I'd have to say:

1.  {{champion:268}} Hands down my favorite champion.  I love the character and his gameplay, because commanding is sick imo.
2. {{champion:29}} 2nd to Azir, his insane personality is fun.
3. {{champion:4}} Fun to play, magic card hustler is a cool archetype.  Plus his AA's sound glorious when you have really high attack speed.
4. {{champion:56}} Switch to sweeper trinket, kill wards, ???, invoke fear.
5. {{champion:161}} He just... feels powerful.  Fun to play too.  Very dark personality, but in a scientific way.

1. {{champion:143}} Get slapped by plants 
2. {{champion:117}} Get slapped by a faery
3. {{champion:99}}  Get slapped by light 
4. {{champion:25}}  Get slapped by a part-baker, part dark magic fallen angel
5. {{champion:134}} Get slapped by ba-......nevermind

Blitzcrank: just the pulling itself is satisfying. A madlife pull is literally orgasmic, and if I can get them under a turret/base, I just laugh while watching them die.

Thresh: See Blitz

Nautilus. While I prefer the above two more, his grab is SO much more satisfying. Not to mention his insane cc.

Lux: I love the feeling of killing someone by activating every single one of my abilities simultaneously. It's like Ryze, but without the 0 second cool downs

Lee Sin: I am mediocre at lee. That's why when I do something insane, I'm much more satisfied than a Steak and Velveeta MacoronI and Cheese shells dinner
You have a CC-lock fetish.
I mean, you play annie. You must love holding people in place for the rest of eternity as much as I do

{{champion:98}} : My main, my man. So tanky, so fun. 
{{champion:412}} : Hook, line, and sinker. Grab is fun, adc thresh is fun, sup thresh is fun, just fun in general.
{{champion:63}} : Whole new brand of power, blazing his way to victory. He really got me fired up.
{{champion:104}} : Its a grave mistake to face me with him, its my destiny to win with him.
{{champion:54}} : My first main, rock solid champ, and i rock using him.
Edit: I love them all, they are so much fun to play, even if i'm not the greatest player with them.

1. {{champion:161}} (mid only/not as support) Cause if you hit your e, the enemy mid laner is dead.
2. {{champion:245}} Cause I stole baron with him.
3. {{champion:17}} Cause I like his dot abilities and also love to see the whole enemy team burning after they went in a shroom.
4. {{champion:74}} Probably my first main. Just set your towers and you can be afk on lane.
5. {{champion:222}} cause of reasons
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

1. {{champion:143}}  I like to torture people in lane. 

2.  {{champion:16}}  I like to torture people in lane.

3. {{champion:43}}  I like to torture people in lane. 

4. {{champion:99}}  I like to torture people in my team with my horrible skillshots.

5.  {{champion:117}}  I like to  torture assassins.

Honorable mention to {{champion:44}} . Spamming gems never gets old.

> {{champion:117}}  I like to torture assassins

You mean you ARE the assassin

1. {{champion:62}} - nothing is more satisfying than beating newer champs than to use a champ with old, pretty basic mechanics. Plus he is a difficult champ to gank, which makes him a little less likely to be camped by the enemy jungle.
2. {{champion:150}} also a difficult champ to gank, with the benefits of a resourceless kit to boot. The most satisfying part of Gnar is when you get into late game and he can fill his rage bar in no time flat. That and his Ult :3
3. {{champion:432}} I love when I use his Ult+Q combo in a team fight. If your whole team synergises well, they will have enough time to get into position and open up a devastating combo on the enemy.
4. {{champion:201}} I love building as much Armor/MR as possible and becoming my teams shield. That, and his ult is fun to use.
5. {{champion:96}} As low as his win rate is right now, I really enjoy the rapid fire from his W.

I played devourer + Rageblade kog in the jungle.
I suffered for a while, but oh my was the end result worth it.
Time of my life 10/10 but probably wouldnt do again

1. {{champion:45}} I don't care that you are a tank. We are 50 minutes in the game and I have 1300 AP, so I kill you.
2. {{champion:45}} You just completed Rabadons? Nice, gives me even more damage.
3. {{champion:45}} Nope Lee. Nope Kalista. Nope Riven. Nope Yasuo. You can't dash through my cage. Stop trying.
4. {{champion:45}} Try to flash away from my ult with AP scaling projectile size which caused it to turn into a huuuuuge ball of death? Doesn't work mate.
5. {{champion:74}} 3 man gank? I have 4 turrets. Outnumbered.

1) {{champion:119}} because draaaven
2) {{champion:14}} i don't die :D
3) {{champion:412}} me? mad? hahaha quite likely.
4) {{champion:81}} time for a true dis- ahw fuck it, let me just 100 to 0 you in 2 seconds with only a luden's
5) {{champion:122}} the ultimate disrespect

{{champion:75}} Taunt spam is ultimate BM, they always underestimate my stacks.
{{champion:161}} Frickin' laser beams are too fun
{{champion:72}} First champion I ever played. Never failed to have fun with him no matter how bad his current rework is(n't).
{{champion:154}} LEEEEEEEROOOY JEEEEEENKIIIINS! (Proceeds to win team fight)
{{champion:30}} Nuclear launch detected! Permission to shit yourself: Granted!
No particular order

{{champion:82}} : Because Smash
{{champion:266}} : BLOOD FOR THE BLOOD GOD, SKULLS FOR THE SKULL THRONE
{{champion:122}} : Get DUNKED
{{champion:254}} : I like punching people, sue me
{{champion:120}} : He does nothing but go all in.

In fact, all of these champions do nothing but go all in.
I am apparently a simple player.

{{champion:106}} amazing combo follow up 
{{champion:89}} first try always will like it the double stun rules !
{{champion:35}} gank master !
{{champion:5}} speed is everything !
{{champion:24}} classic nerfed still kicks ass !!

1.{{champion:238}} because I had many 1v5 pentas
2.{{champion:67}}  love the high risk high reward play style
3.{{champion:119}}  who doesn't love a egocentric person throwing a giant axe at you
4.{{champion:55}}  PENTA KILL
5.{{champion:40}} who doesn't want to feel good for 2 cents an hour?

1. {{champion:114}} Cause hitting them 4 vitals on ult feels so good.
2. {{champion:412}} I mean, what's better than a god hook that wins the game?
3. {{champion:61}} You know, that shockwave.... sooo satisfying.
4. {{champion:34}} Oh gawd, nothing like splitting/catching the enemy team with a wall.
5. {{champion:114}} Is bae <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3

{{champion:245}} Pulling off a multi-man stun by predicting their movements feels so satisfying.
{{champion:432}} Full AP Bard Mid that leads into 700 Chime damage autos is amazing.
{{champion:90}} Ult a squishy, or ult a tank. They die.
{{champion:143}} Support or Mid, the damage you do is amazing.
{{champion:110}} Sieging enemies non-stop from afar makes me feel like Hawkeye.
